parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mission Information

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks whether the given key is active in the current user profile.

See keys, keysLimit and doneKeys in the [[Description.ext#keys|description.ext]] file of the missions.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isKeyActive''' keyName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> keyName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_active = [[isKeyActive]] "Mission04Key";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[activateKey]], [[deActivateKey]]
</value></part></template>
